content: Troye Sivan, a multi-talented Australian musician, is known for his insightful lyrics, diversity of musical styles and advocacy for self-acceptance and equality. His music represents the emotions of youth, freedom and love and encourages listeners to be brave enough to express themselves. Interacting with the Troye Sivan character, you can explore music, creative process, youth and social issues, singing the melody of love together and building a future of equality.
